data.name: RPG Maker MV - Call of Darkness: Japanese Resource Pack
data.detailed_description:
Introducing the awaited KADOKAWA official resource series from the RPG Maker MV developer team! The first Japanese trilogy is packed with sounds and tilesets to express themes of "light" "darkness" and "twilight" in a Japanese flavor. These resources are suitable not only for Japanese RPGs but also just right to present a cyber appearance. Also, as a special perk for buying, we've resized battler data from XP to fit MV and included several pieces in each package.

Materials included in Japanese Resource Pack No.1-2 "Call of Darkness"

- BGM
Battle 2 / Battle 3 / Dungeon 1 / Dungeon 2 / Ghost Appearance 1
Ghost Appearance 2 / The Trial / Anger / Sorrow

- ME
Game Over 1 / Game Over 2 / Shock 1
Shock 2 / Serious 1

- SE
Well Bucket 1 / Well Bucket 2 / Well Bucket 3 / Hearth 1 / Hearth 2 / Hearth 3
Jar / Bucket / Jizo Monk / Stone Lantern / Straw Doll / Charm / Drawers 1 / Drawers 2 /Noose
Wooden Sliding Door 1 / Wooden Sliding Door 2 / Sliding Screen 1 / Sliding Screen 2 / Blood Splatter

-Tilesets
Charm, Blood, Demoness, Grave, Straw Doll, Japanese Doll, and other resources suited for Japanese horror.
Materials in various states of disrepair are also included.

- Bonus: RPG Maker XP Battler Data
Fighter04 / Mage06 / Undead04 / Aquatic01 / Monster11

Sample (SoundCloud)
https://soundcloud.com/rpg-maker/1-2mv-m05t-addpack-jp-battle-1

* This resource pack is one part of a trilogy of Japanese resources. You can check out other two packs below
http://store.steampowered.com/app/558760
http://store.steampowered.com/app/558762

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
